title: Unchained Alistar (OCE)
body:
Hey I subscribe to the riot games youtube channel and I would like to obtain the unchain Alistar skin that is being offered in other regions. Is this a possibility of me receiving the skin.

thanks,
Mithog

replies.body:
Hey Shia LaDragBuff,

There is currently an issue with the platform for redeeming the skin, so weâ€™ll have to go the more manual route instead. To obtain the Unchained Alistar skin for subscribing to the League of Legends YouTube channel, please [**submit a ticket to Riot Games Player Support**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us)! As you submit your request, here are some tips that will reduce the amount of time before you join the Rift with your new Alistar skin! 

1. Create an account on the Riot Games Support website. It'll save you a lot of time in the future and keep your requests organized and easier to find/access. 
2. Be sure to submit as much information in your initial ticket as possible. For obvious reasons, each Player Support Specialist's request for more information will delay the resolution of the issue.
3. Be respectful and polite in your correspondences with Riot Support. (They're doing their best to help you!)
4. Try not create a new ticket or respond to an existing ticket before a Player Support Specialist has had the chance to review your request. New tickets/replies may bump your ticket back to the bottom of the queue, thus increasing the amount of time before a Player Support Specialist is able to review your ticket.  

**If you're unsure where to put your ticket in, just select:**
[*I have a question about League of Legends/Riot Games.*] > [*Game and Features*] > [*General Questions*]

If you have any additional questions, please let me know. Good luck!
Thanks sorry for late reply. I don't really access this site much, more just the game :P. Hopefully it will come though...
put in a support ticket and they'll help you out
